data.title: About Joe & Lewies Penalty Box
data.meta_description: Joe & Lewie’s Penalty Box in Fenton is a hockey-theme restaurant with comfortable seating and a live DJ every Friday and Saturday. We also offer outstanding catering options to help you take your next event to the next level.
data.text:
Joe & Lewie’s Penalty Box in Fenton is a hockey-theme restaurant with comfortable seating and a live DJ every Friday and Saturday. The décor is hockey, hockey, hockey, with arena-like ceilings and lights with lots of murals of hockey players, banners and jerseys. One of our unique features is an area we refer to as the “Locker Room”. The seating area has a wall decoration which is a replica of the Red Wings locker room back in the days when the restaurant first opened.

We serve only the highest quality of foods prepared with the finest ingredients. Our food offerings include a wide variety of customer favorites from our Penalty Pleasers Appetizers, Powerplay Sandwiches, Penalty Box Pizza, Italian Specialties to our Playoff Entrees we have something for everyone from one to eighty-one. For your dining enjoyment we also have a full bar with all your favorite drinks, including wines and Joe’s Knockout Punch. Our experienced staff is second to none and will ensure that your dining experience is a memorable one!

IN THE NEWS
